post.subject: Character Event Warp: Stormrider's Bolt & Indelible Coterie
post.structured_content:
[{"insert":"
"},{"insert":{"image":"https://upload-os-bbs.hoyolab.com/upload/2024/08/29/9cfec60d381d1aea36ca6ef029a0d622_5947026659576468355.jpg"},"attributes":{"align":"img-center","height":1080,"width":1920,"size":"292567"}},{"insert":"Hello, Trailblazers!
Character Event Warp Period for this phase is after the Version 2.5 update – 2024/10/02 11:59:00 (server time), and includes the following content:

▌"Stormrider's Bolt" Character Event Warp"},{"insert":"
","attributes":{"header":4}},{"insert":"●During the event, the drop rates of the limited 5-star character "Feixiao (The Hunt: Wind)" and 4-star characters "Moze (The Hunt: Lightning)," "Asta (Harmony: Fire)," and "Luka (Nihility: Physical)" will be boosted.

■Event Period
After the Version 2.5 update – 2024/10/02 11:59:00 (server time)

■Drop Rate Boost: 5-Star Character
Feixiao (The Hunt: Wind)

■Drop Rate Boost: 4-Star Characters
Moze (The Hunt: Lightning)
Asta (Harmony: Fire)
Luka (Nihility: Physical)

▌"Indelible Coterie: Kafka" Character Event Warp"},{"insert":"
","attributes":{"header":4}},{"insert":"●During the event, the drop rates of the limited 5-star character "Kafka (Nihility: Lightning)" and 4-star characters "Moze (The Hunt: Lightning)," "Asta (Harmony: Fire)" and "Luka (Nihility: Physical)" will be boosted.

■Event Period
After the Version 2.5 update – 2024/10/02 11:59:00 (server time)

■Drop Rate Boost: 5-Star Character
Kafka (Nihility: Lightning)

■Drop Rate Boost: 4-Star Characters
Moze (The Hunt: Lightning)
Asta (Harmony: Fire)
Luka (Nihility: Physical)

▌"Indelible Coterie: Black Swan" Character Event Warp"},{"insert":"
","attributes":{"header":4}},{"insert":"●During the event, the drop rates of the limited 5-star character "Black Swan (Nihility: Wind)" and 4-star characters "Moze (The Hunt: Lightning)," "Asta (Harmony: Fire)," and "Luka (Nihility: Physical)" will be boosted.

■Event Period
After the Version 2.5 update – 2024/10/02 11:59:00 (server time)

■Drop Rate Boost: 5-Star Character
Black Swan (Nihility: Wind)

■Drop Rate Boost: 4-Star Characters
Moze (The Hunt: Lightning)
Asta (Harmony: Fire)
Luka (Nihility: Physical)

▌"Indelible Coterie: Robin" Character Event Warp"},{"insert":"
","attributes":{"header":4}},{"insert":"●During the event, the drop rates of the limited 5-star character "Robin (Harmony: Physical)" and 4-star characters "Moze (The Hunt: Lightning)," "Asta (Harmony: Fire)," and "Luka (Nihility: Physical)" will be boosted.

■Event Period
After the Version 2.5 update – 2024/10/02 11:59:00 (server time)

■Drop Rate Boost: 5-Star Character
Robin (Harmony: Physical)

■Drop Rate Boost: 4-Star Characters
Moze (The Hunt: Lightning)
Asta (Harmony: Fire)
Luka (Nihility: Physical)

※ Among the above characters, the limited character will not be available in the Stellar Warp event.
※ During the event, the limited 5-star character "Feixiao (The Hunt: Wind)" can only be obtained from Character Event Warp "Stormrider's Bolt."
※ During the event, the limited 5-star characters "Kafka (Nihility: Lightning)," "Black Swan (Nihility: Wind)," and "Robin (Harmony: Physical)" can only be obtained from the corresponding "Indelible Coterie" Character Event Warp.
※ After the event ends, 4-star character "Moze (The Hunt: Lightning)" will become a part of Stellar Warp but not Departure Warp.
※ This Warp is considered a Character Event Warp. The cumulative Warp count for a guaranteed 5-star character in any Character Event Warp will always be carried over to other Character Event Warps, but is independent of and unaffected by other types of Warps.
※ "Indelible Coterie" Character Event Warp will become available during irregular periods in future version updates. For more details, please stay tuned for official announcements.
※ For more information, please head to the Warp screen.

▌Temporary Early Access for Material Stages"},{"insert":"
","attributes":{"header":4}},{"insert":"●Event Period: After the Version 2.5 update – 2024/10/09 11:59:00 (server time)
●Event Details: During the event period, stages that drop Ascension and Trace Materials for "Feixiao (The Hunt: Wind)," "Kafka (Nihility: Lightning)," "Black Swan (Nihility: Wind)," "Robin (Harmony: Physical)," and "Moze (The Hunt: Lightning)" will temporarily become available. If Trailblazers haven't unlocked these stages, they can use the "Interastral Peace Guide - Survival Index" to challenge the stages directly.
●Stagnant Shadows, Calyxes (Crimson), and Echo of War stages corresponding to the characters above will be available in this phase.
※ The Echo of War stage corresponding to the character "Moze (The Hunt: Lightning)" is not available for early access.

▌Character Trial Event: Aptitude Showcase"},{"insert":"
","attributes":{"header":4}},{"insert":"●Requirements: Unlock Travel Log
●Event Period: After the Version 2.5 update – 2024/10/02 11:59:00 (server time)
●Event Details: Trial characters "Feixiao (The Hunt: Wind)," "Kafka (Nihility: Lightning)," "Black Swan (Nihility: Wind)," "Robin (Harmony: Physical)," "Moze (The Hunt: Lightning)," "Asta (Harmony: Fire)," and "Luka (Nihility: Physical)" can be used to experience stages. Upon completing the challenges, Trailblazers can obtain Stellar Jade, Adventure Log, Universal Enhancement Material, and Credit.
"}]

user.introduce: May This Journey Lead Us Starward
